author: GamingBolt
description:
The stakes are high for Fatal Fury’s first new entry in a two and a half decades to live up to its prior reputation as one of the most iconic fighting games of all time. Thankfully, given the rejuvenation of its predecessor’s fighting mechanics, a healthy dose of modern mechanics of its own, and that awe-striking art design, Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves has every chance to place itself amongst the pantheon of world’s greatest fighting games. 

Fast-paced, technical, and complex, yet with ample onboarding for newcomers, this feature will discuss all that’s new and all that’s old in Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves and, hopefully, illustrate why even casual fighting fans should be excited by this one.
title: Why I CAN'T WAIT To Play Fatal Fury: City of The Wolves

author: GamingBolt
description: This week was filled with tons of gaming news. Here we highlight the biggest ones you need to know about.
title: The Witcher 4 Not Releasing In 2027, Next Batman Game Details, GTA Ex-Developer NEW Game And More

author: GamingBolt
description:
Since its release in November 2021, Playground Games' Forza Horizon 5 has been considered one of the best, if not the best, racing games out there. Its open world, hundreds of unique cars, realistic driving, incredible range of activities, progression systems, and stunning visuals have attracted tens of millions of players.

With Microsoft's new multiplatform initiative, PS5 players can finally join the crowd while experiencing all the updates and additional content. Panic Button, in conjunction with Turn 10 and Playground Games, has also added several noteworthy features, like DualSense support, PS5 Pro enhancements, and parity between all platforms.

Alongside the Horizon Realms update, which will be available for all platforms and adds new cars, Accolades, and a new track, Forza Horizon 5 should see a second wave of popularity. Here's everything you need to know before picking it up on April 29th for PS5.
title: Forza Horizon 5 PS5 - 15 Things You ABSOLUTELY Need To Know Before You Buy
